aboutInitialization.description2: Visit i18next documentation to learn more
aboutInitialization.title: About Initialization
aboutInitialization.webhookTest: They see me rollin', they testin'...

customFormatters.description: Custom formatters are defined in `src/utils/string-formatters` and are added to the i18next instance in `src/core/i18n.ts`.
customFormatters.title: Custom Formatters

interpolation.description: You can use interpolation to insert dynamic values into strings.
interpolation.title: Interpolation

multipleFallbackKeys.description: We can combine multiple fallback keys with interpolation, and even translate the variables that are interpolated!
multipleFallbackKeys.example: So here's an error code: '{{errorCode}}', and it says: '{{message}}', nice huh?
multipleFallbackKeys.title: Multiple Fallback Keys

plurals.description: There are "special" key suffixes that can be used to handle plurals. In English these are "_zero", "_one" and "_other".
plurals.title: Plurals
